mapper.select: SELECT A.TEAM_POST_ID , A.TITLE , A.CONTENT , A.CREATED_AT , A.UPDATED_AT , A.USER_ID , A.TEAM_BOARD_ID , A.COMMENTS , B.USERNAME , B.POSITION , B.PROFILE_PHOTO FROM TBL_TEAM_POST A INNER JOIN TBL_USER B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID WHERE A.TEAM_BOARD_ID = #{teamBoardId} ORDER BY A.TEAM_POST_ID DESC
